item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: It does not. You get the "Survived the Impossibile" permanent item.

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: Well, you do get benefits if you're in a village that blew up from the Impossible Mission. Maybe that counts as a bloodline?

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded:
There is no reason to believe that has been added yet, as it probably would have been more of a hassle that it was worth.

At this point, I think I'm leaning towards what naito thought, as it seems the most likely at the moment.

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: the first version of True blood of the reaper counts as a blood line. So in all you would need for the S2+ Jonin exam, Starting bloodline, Trade/Reaper, and Wasteland. (Or trade and reaper and no wasteland.)

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded:
Bloodline Reqs: Due to the two new Bloodlines, S2+ Jonin needs 3, and Sannin needs 4.

They were asking what the new ones are. Mysterious Power isn't a new bloodline, but Wasteland Disease is, which is why they're curious as to what the other new bloodline mentioned is.

I don't know exactly how the statement was meant, but whatever. We'll know it when we see it, after all.

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: There are 5 bloodlines that you get now. These are WE/RE/Legacy, The Trade, True Blood of the Reaper, Wasteland Disease and Mysterious Power Bloodline.

item.title: Re: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: Well the first is Wasteland disease. The second is apparently the more advanced version of that bloodline. I am not sure though because to my knowledge no one has gotten the advanced version yet.

item.title: Bloodline
item.content:encoded: I just read on the BvS site that there are two new bloodlines therefore S2+ jounin need 3 bloodlines and sanin need 4, my question is what are these bloodlines and how do u get them?
